reviews.text: Stayed for 1 night on our way back from the lakes. Staff are so helpful. Politeness goes to another level. Credit again to premier inn.
reviews.title: Great value, again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We find the prices hard to beat on a short trip away. Would recommend.
reviews.title: A friendly welcome and all the essentials

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Adjacent bar/restaurant does what it says on the tin.
reviews.title: Getting it right!

reviews.text: I've stayed in a few of this type of hotel before and this is arguably the best. My partner and I were warmly welcomed by a very well trained local lady. The room was quiet, clean and the associated pub restaurant ideal for a short stay. Excellent value for money....especially the breakfast!
reviews.title: Handforth premier inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is only our second time staying at a Premier Inn and this seems to be a chain that is really getting it's priorities right and offering very good value for money. We spent three nights at Handforth while visiting family in the area.
reviews.title: four nights at Premier Inn Handforth.

reviews.text: I rate Premier Inn as a good quality comfortable business hotel, however this time the 2 day stay was ruined due to the lack of reliable WiFi. When I complained I was told by the help desk to get a refund - I did not want a refund I wanted WiFi which seemed strange to the help desk operator. Completely unsatisfactory as it was a business stay.
reviews.title: Poor WiFi ruined a pleasant stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an excellent little hotel - the staff are very friendly and always keen to help.
reviews.title: Great value, friendly service

reviews.text: The rooms are a decent size for the price. Handforth station is a 5 mins walk away and the hotel offers free parking for guests.
reviews.title: A great place to gather the family for a Golden Wedding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The attached pub offers decent food and doubles up as the breakfast location too offering excellent value, high quality buffet breakfasts (with hot food cooked to order).
reviews.title: Premier

reviews.text: Lack of aircon is the one small downside, but fans are provided (they are pretty quiet too) and the hotel's location allows you to sleep with the windows open if it's a little hot.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.text: It was as straight forward as the title makes out. Great location set back off a main road but was unaware of traffic or noise. The restaurant could not get any closer without being in the same building.
reviews.title: Comfortable, no fuss with friendly staff

reviews.text: But negotiating that bed???? And for someone of my small stature it was like a puzzle! First it rolls around the room then when inside the bed its like sleeping on a speed bump! The must uncomfortable bed I've ever slept in!
reviews.title: I don't know how Lenny Henry did it.....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Moved here when Cheadle PI was full, wish we had come here first. Much quieter area, newer property, slightly better room and a pretty good pub/restaurant. Good people and very clean. Excellent nights sleep. Good Internet speed but does keep dropping
reviews.title: Better than Cheadle

reviews.text: We stopped for two nights on our way from the Lake District, intending to visit Quarry Bank Mill.
reviews.title: Very friendly staff

reviews.text: Greeted by a very pleasant chatty receptionist, and given our room keys. Every time we passed through reception we were asked if everything was ok, which I can definitely say it was.
reviews.title: Great weekend stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good large room with comfy bed. Though shower was noisy when we used it never bothered us - hope it never bothered other guests as we were up early.
reviews.title: Good for airport but beware of Sat Nav directions!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The issue is the Postcode and when this is put into the Sat Nav we ended up on Wilmslow Road in Cheadle! We rang hotel for instructions and guess what it is not uncommon! Even when we put revised address in Sat Nav took us around wrong part of Handforth. I mentioned this postcode "fault" when we checked in and another guest had similar problems - so be very careful if using sat nav to get you there.
reviews.title: Just the job

reviews.text: A one night stay only, but a good experience. Large, clean room, with a really comfortable bed and a choice of pillows. We slept well, despite some traffic noise. The Inn is adjacent to a bar/restaurant, where breakfast is served. Did not try the cooked fare, but the cold selection was quite acceptable. Staff here and in the Inn were really welcoming and eager to please. The hotel is situated close to Styal Mill, and is quite handy for Manchester Airport. Large, free car park. All in all, very satisfactory
reviews.title: Perfect overnight stay

reviews.text: Very warm welcome from Receptionist. Room clean and very comfortable.
reviews.title: Another handy premier inn

reviews.text: Excellent breakfast at Chef and Brewer pub/restaurant next door.
reviews.title: Very good as expected
